DOC.HEAD: $Adv31
For Release Sunday, Dec. 31, and Theraefter
AP World Symposium 90s Editor's Note
DOC.TEXT: The 1980s come to an end on a crashing wave of change across the world: Communism collapsed in Eastern Europe and is in convulsion in the Soviet Union. Chinese students shook China's aging Communist establishment and while their democracy movemement was crushed it is not dead. The Middle East saw an uprising of Palestinians against Israel. The cauldron of Central America boiled over. South Americans reeled in the throes of economic crises brought on by mountains of debt. And so it went across the world ... But what lies ahead for the new decade? In the following stories, Associated Press correspondents in key areas of the world look ahead to the decade of the 1990s.
